thread.title: Nicole Scherzinger and Myleene Klass lead the BRITS 2017 red carpet worst dressed

author: glittlejohn
title: Nicole Scherzinger and Myleene Klass lead the BRITS 2017 red carpet worst dressed
text:
Nicole Scherzinger and Myleene Klass lead the BRITS 2017 red carpet worst dressed 
They might want to have a few choice words with their stylists BY GEORGINA LITTLEJOHN Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window) Comments NICOLE Scherzinger and Myleene Klass might want to have a serious word with their stylist tonight after they arrived for tonight’s BRIT Awards looking less than their glamorous best. 
Scherzinger, 38, looked like she’s channelled the worst of the Eighties in a red blazer and matching thigh-high boots. lia.toby.wenn@gmail.com 3 Nicole Scherzinger went full-on Eighties in her red jacket and thigh-high boots combo 
To top it off, the X Factor judge sported big backcombed crimped hair pushed back from her face. 
And some of her fellow celebrity guests didn’t fare any better in the fashion stakes. 
Myleene Klass looked like she was going to a salsa class instead of the biggest night of the year for the British music industry. Goff Photos 3 And it didn’t look much better from the back 
The mother-of-two, who usually gets it oh-so right, posed for pictures on the red carpet in a white off-the-shoulder jumpsuit. 
She accessorised the look with a black belt and red roses in her hair as well as a pair of towering Louboutin heels – which looked as though they were being dragged under the hem of her suit. Goff Photos
